title: ROCAS Automatic Watch Face
summary: Automatic is a classic and elegant Watch Face for Android Wear devices.

description: Automatic is a classic and elegant Watch Face for Android Wear devices. Features:♦ Designed for Round and Square Watches♦ 2 color themes♦ Date display♦ Full and Low bit ambient modesOptions:Settings are accessible via the Android Wear Companion App on your phone. Simply select Automatic and click on the Gear Icon to open the settings panel.♦ Skin selection (Black/White)♦ Ambient mode selection (Full/Low bit)If you have any problems with the application, please don’t rate us 1-star and contact us directly at rocas.watchfaces@gmail.com.We’re committed to providing quality products and technical support to all our users. descriptionHTML:
Automatic is a classic and elegant Watch Face for Android Wear devices.

Features:

♦ Designed for Round and Square Watches
♦ 2 color themes
♦ Date display
♦ Full and Low bit ambient modes


Options:
Settings are accessible via the Android Wear Companion App on your phone. Simply select Automatic and click on the Gear Icon to open the settings panel.

♦ Skin selection (Black/White)
♦ Ambient mode selection (Full/Low bit)

If you have any problems with the application, please don’t rate us 1-star and contact us directly at rocas.watchfaces@gmail.com.
We’re committed to providing quality products and technical support to all our users.



Made with love in Montreal♥
comments: Love it! Fair play, you guys really know who to do classy looking watch faces that work well on smartwatches don't you? I've been looking for a decent one with Roman Numerals. White or Black? Can't decide...
Great looking but one flaw I really like the way it look, only problem is I wish they had a second had "sweep"  option, I prefer the automatic watch feel
My go-to watch face when I want my watch to look like a classy time piece. Top 3, hands down.
Roman digit watch Really very nice. Been lucky to find one
